title: pOTri un pugazh
sahitya:
pOTri un pugazh pADi EtramuruvEn murugA


anupallavi

  sOTrai dinam tinru sOmbalin vITrirundu kAlam vIN pOkkAmal


caraNam    eNNangaL ettanaiyO eNNi eNNi idayam puNNAkkiDum vaNNam puzhugit-tuDikkAdu
maNNAshaiyODu ponnAshai maNDiyE veDikkAdu aNNalE unniDam aDaikkalam nADi nAn
